title: Is Riot checking matches of reported players?
body:
So there are many situations, when someone is lynching others for feeding, not intentional but just looking at the stats no matter if it was only bad game... And u are reporting this person for actual harassment by but many people sadly doesnt care and they are just blaming u with bad stats as well. So I was wondering - Is riot sometimes checking matches and chat in this type of games? Hope so they are checking itsomehow or it would be so unfair so many times. 
PS. Sorry for bad english, I hope it's understandable.

replies.body: Riot doesnt look at shit. it's reviewed by a robot.
They check matches of reported players. So if you report a player, their chat and/or actions is looked at.
